title: Ben Stiller | Orgies, Cocaine and Burner Phones Consume GOP Thanks to Cawthorn and Trump: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump denying ever using a burner phone while House Republicans are getting asked if they’re into cocaine and orgies.

Then, Ben Stiller talks about growing up in the entertainment industry, his lifelong love of filmmaking and embarrassing himself in front of Steven Spielberg.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
